name: vscode-highlight
description: Advanced text highlighter based on regexes. Useful for todos, annotations, colors etc.

highlight.decorations.description: Default decorations from which all others inherit from

highlight.regexes.description: Object mapping regexes to an array of decorations to apply to the capturing groups

oneOf.markdownDescription:
Decoration values can also include placeholders like $1 or $2 that will be replaced with the content of the respective capturing group, enabling complex use cases like CSS colors highlighting.

All the supported decoration options are defined [here](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/extensionAPI/vscode-api#DecorationRenderOptions)

after.description: Defines the rendering options of the attachment that is inserted after the decorated text.

before.description: Defines the rendering options of the attachment that is inserted before the decorated text.

backgroundColor.markdownDescription: Background color of the decoration. Use rgba() and define transparent background colors to play well with other decorations. Alternatively a color from the color registry can be [referenced](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/vscode-api#ThemeColor).

border.markdownDescription: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

borderColor.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration. Better use 'border' for setting one or more of the individual border properties.

borderRadius.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration. Better use 'border' for setting one or more of the individual border properties.

borderSpacing.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration. Better use 'border' for setting one or more of the individual border properties.

borderStyle.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration. Better use 'border' for setting one or more of the individual border properties.

borderWidth.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration. Better use 'border' for setting one or more of the individual border properties.

color.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration

cursor.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

fontStyle.description: Sets the all font styles of the rule: 'italic', 'bold', 'underline' or 'strikethrough' or a combination. All styles that are not listed are unset. The empty string unsets all styles.
fontStyle.patternErrorMessage: Font style must be 'italic', 'bold', 'underline' or 'strikethrough' or a combination. The empty string unsets all styles.

fontWeight.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

opacity.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

isWholeLine.markdownDescription: Should the decoration be rendered also on the whitespace after the line text. Defaults to `false`.

letterSpacing.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

gutterIconPath.markdownDescription: An **absolute path** or an URI to an image to be rendered in the gutter.

gutterIconSize.description: Specifies the size of the gutter icon. Available values are 'auto', 'contain', 'cover' and any percentage value.

outline.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

outlineColor.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration

outlineStyle.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration. Better use 'outline' for setting one or more of the individual outline properties.

outlineWidth.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration. Better use 'outline' for setting one or more of the individual outline properties.

overviewRulerLane.description: The position in the overview ruler where the decoration should be rendered.

overviewRulerColor.description: The color of the decoration in the overview ruler. Use rgba() and define transparent colors to play well with other decorations.

rangeBehavior.markdownDescription: Customize the growing behavior of the decoration when edits occur at the edges of the decoration's range. Defaults to `DecorationRangeBehavior.OpenOpen`.

textDecoration.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

regexFlags.description: Flags used when building this regex

filterLanguageRegex.description: Apply only if current file's language matches this regex. Requires double escaping

filterFileRegex.markdownDescription: Apply only if the current file's path matches this regex. Requires double escaping.

highlight.minDelay.description: Minimum number of milliseconds to wait before highlighting the document after a change, used for throttling

highlight.maxMatches.description: Maximum number of matches to decorate per regex, in order not to crash the app with accidental cathastropic regexes
